long_description: at dentistry for children, we provide compassionate pediatric dental care in a fun, child-friendly setting. we want your child to think of the dentist as a friend. that's why we've designed our office specifically for the needs of pediatric patients. your child will love coming to the dentist. our atlanta-area dental team is focused on your kids. we have created a comfortable, playful space designed with kids in mind. a child's first dental experience of the dentist can influence his or her mindset on dental care for life. at dentistry for children, we don't just care for smilesâ€”we create them.
